title: Not just the best Bond movie
review: It might be one of the most carefully and artfully crafted action films of all time.

title: Not an MCU script - and it shows
review: Poor Spider-Man. He gets to be awesome in the avengers movies, and then has to be a dumb, selfish high school kid as the title character. This film has so many illogical holes in the characters' decisions, it is amazing the script got the green light

title: Best MCU movie
review: It's not the biggest, the cutest, or the funniest. It's just the best stand alone production among all the MCU projects.
